code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");async function loginUser(e){e.preventDefault();const response=await fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(data.user){alert("Login successful");window.location.href="/dashboard";}else{alert("Login failed");}console.log(data);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:loginUser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Login"})]})]});}export default Login;
